actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A resolution directing the Secretary of the Senate to request the House of Representatives to return the official papers on S. 414, and make a technical correction in the Act as passed by the Senate.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to request the House of Representatives to return the official papers on S. 414 (shipping revisions and make a technical correction in such bill as passed by the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Secretary of the Senate to request the House of Representatives to return the official papers on S. 414, and make a technical correction in the Act as passed by the Senate.
